Brent Barry

Brent Robert Barry

(Bones)

Position: Shooting Guard and Small Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-6, 185lb (198cm, 83kg)

Born: December 31, 1971 in Hempstead, New York us

Relatives: Brothers Drew Barry, Jon Barry, Canyon Barry; Father Rick Barry; Grandfather Bruce Hale

College: Oregon State

High School: De La Salle Catholic in Concord, California

Draft: Denver Nuggets, 1st round (15th pick, 15th overall), 1995 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 3, 1995

Career Length: 14 years

  • 2x NBA Champ
  • 1995-96 All-Rookie

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Brent Barry?

Brent Barry is 53 years old.

Where was Brent Barry born?

Brent Barry was born in Hempstead, New York.

When was Brent Barry born?

Brent Barry was born on December 31, 1971.

How tall is Brent Barry?

Brent Barry is 6-6 (198 cm) tall.

How much did Brent Barry weigh when playing?

Brent Barry weighed 185 lbs (83 kg) when playing.

Is Brent Barry in the Hall of Fame?

Brent Barry is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Brent Barry drafted?

Brent Barry was drafted by Denver Nuggets, 1st round (15th pick, 15th overall), 1995 NBA Draft.

What position did Brent Barry play?

Shooting Guard and Small Forward.

When did Brent Barry retire?

Brent Barry last played in 2009.

What is Brent Barry's net worth?

Brent Barry made at least $53,464,860 playing professional basketball.

How much did Brent Barry make?

Brent Barry made $5,544,370 in 2008.

What did Brent Barry average?

Brent Barry averaged 9.3 points, 3.0 rebounds, and 3.2 assists per game.

How many rings does Brent Barry have?

Brent Barry won 2 championships.

Brent Barry is on Twitter at Barryathree.

What schools did Brent Barry attend?

Brent Barry attended De La Salle Catholic in Concord, California and Oregon State.
